english.segment1: You are the First and Last. And I can't compare to that. You are the One in stars and the sun. And I can't compare to that. Never could compare to that
english.segment2: Still, my reason can sometimes be misplaced. And seasons will hide but You don't change
english.segment3: All I can see is vast. And I can't compare to that. You are the One letting me come. And I can't compare to that. Never could compare to that
english.segment4: Still, my reason can sometimes be misplaced. And seasons will hide but You don't change
english.segment5: My reason can sometimes be misplaced. And seasons will hide but You don't change
english.segment6: Feel the bitter and the sweet. You decide to collide into me. Hear the new symphony, yeah
english.segment7: It's what I needed. It's what I needed to bring me to see
english.segment8: Reason can sometimes be misplaced. And seasons will hide but You don't change
english.segment9: My reason can sometimes be misplaced. And seasons will hide but You don't change
